title: Ground News - Here’s Sunak’s problem in deciding the election date: things are very bad now – and they could get much worse
text:
Summary by The Guardian With the polls against him and the Tories in turmoil, a May date might be the PM’s best gamble – but gambling isn’t his forte, says Henry Hill, deputy editor of ConservativeHome Share menu More
